summary: For the last 5 years, our work yielded an average of $158 in financial benefits for every $1 invested in us, as well as an annual average of over 1,300 other benefits. In this testimony before the Senate Subcommittee on the Legislative Branch, Committee on Appropriations, U.S. Comptroller General Gene Dodaro discusses GAO's FY 2023 budget request. We're continuing to evolve with the changing economic...
title: Fiscal Year 2023 Budget Request: U.S. Government Accountability Office
